sequence:
Hammann Observation Diary

<size=45>Chapter 6: Hello, Military Police?!</size>

scripts.say: Um... I just happened to run into the Commander who just happened to tell me about what happened with Hammann... and yeah...
Is that so...? I could've sworn you two were listening in for quite some time...

options.content: I'm sorry! I promise not to eavesdrop anymore!
Sims convinced me to do it!

scripts.say: That's right! It was a total coincidence! Coincidence, I tel you!
Hammann tearfully reached for the telephone to dial the naval headquarters.
Hello? Headquarters?! Yes! There's a commander here... and, and...
...the commander is doing a fine job... yes...

options.content: I'm truly sorry. I could've timed this much better.

scripts.say: ...See? Commander was worried and came looking for you.
Commander, I owe you an apology as well... Sorry for all the trouble Hammann has caused you...
Hammann, this could've all been prevented if you were a bit more honest with yourself~
